scripts.validate:all: npm run validate:template && npm run validate:ci
scripts.validate:ci: node ci/validate.js && node ci/contrast-check.js && node ci/overlap-check.js
scripts.select: node tools/rules/select-layout.mjs content/source.request.json layouts/template_map.json tokens/brand.tokens.json content/final.content.json rules/rules.json
scripts.render: node tools/render/render.mjs tokens/brand.tokens.json layouts/template_map.json content/final.content.json dist/output.pptx
